channel.title: Command to open menu for all players
channel.description:
Hi, i ws wondering if there is a way a can add a command so it opens a menu (like the thing that comes when u log in) for ALL the players that are on the server. I want to do this beause i want a cool way to let the players know of some important update sor news.
Exmaple: ::allplayers (my message)
and it opens a menu saying that
Thanks

item.title: Command to open menu for all players
item.dc:creator: @Gh0st_Jr Gh0st Jr
item.description:
@Gh0st_Jr wrote:

well… that or you could see if your server has ::yell (message)

Read full topic
item.source: Command to open menu for all players

item.title: Command to open menu for all players
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

for(player p : server.playerHandler.players)
if(p != null)
{
p.sendQuest(“Text”, line on menu);
p.showMenuInterface();
}

Read full topic
item.source: Command to open menu for all players
